page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: {Our area}is on the western side of {Wellingborough}and is gradually expanding towards{Mears Ashby.}Our categories include{Farm visits, {Hardwick village}and its school, {Churches, Local Schools, Leisure and the{Wellingborough Enterprise Zone. Wellingborough has changed considerably since the 1960's, from a small market town to an expanding centre for national distribution of industrial and commercial products. We visited a number of farms in our block, all of which were different. Our block is mainly{agricultural}with a growing urban area. Hardwick village was mentioned in the original Domesday book.{Recreation}and{places of worship are well represented.
